name: Visual Scale
summary:
Explore Architecture Like Never Before

Discover the power of real-scale MR visualization with our cutting-edge Meta Quest app. This innovative tool transforms architectural plans into immersive, life-size experiences, allowing you to explore every space with precision—understanding layout, proportions, and intricate details as if you were inside the project.
Step Inside Your Designs
Walk freely through your floor plans, take precise measurements, adjust colors, and customize your experience. Whether...
